channel.title: [pi]npc help?[pi]
channel.description:
Hello:)!
I've recently created a custom mini-game, I have one last thing to fix.
When the player pulls the lever, releasing the NPC's, I want ALL NPC's too move to the player and start too attack.

I have made them aggressive, I don't know how to make them move towards the player though.
Help please!
